description:
Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down even more of the tools for enacting Managed Democracy in Helldivers 2, including the EAT-17 Expendable Anti-Tank Strategem, the Arc-12 Blitzer and the R-36 Eruptor. 

00:00 Opening
00:38 BR-14 Adjudicator
02:21 Arc-12 Blitzer
04:19 R-36 Eruptor
05:48 Muzzle Direction
06:47 GP-31 Grenade Pistol
08:39 MG-205 Heavy Machine Gun Strategem
10:34 E-MG-101 HMG Emplacement Strategem
12:38 EAT-17 Expendable Anti-Tank Strategem
16:19 LAS-99 Quasar Cannon Strategem
16:55 PLAS-1 Scorcher
19:02 LAS-16 Sickle 
22:05 FAF-14 Spear Strategem
23:51 Outro

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries--breaks down more of the guns of Helldivers 2 and compares them to their potential real-life counterparts.

Firearms Expert Reacts playlist - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y4T78VQoWUs&list=PLp
title: Firearms Expert Reacts to Helldivers 2 PART 3

description: Which Star Wars game are you most excited to play?
title: Every Upcoming STAR WARS Game Explained Part 1

description: This video covers how to build a better-starting gun immediately in Gray Zone Warfare. These two builds let you easily attach and detach an ACOG optic as you play.
title: Is That An ACOG In Your Pocket? Gray Zone Warfare💡
